name: VBA DLL Loaded Via Microsoft Word
description: Detects DLL's Loaded Via Word Containing VBA Macros
false_positives: Alerts on legitimate macro usage as well, will need to filter as appropriate
query: (process.executable:(/.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Pp][Nn][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND file.path:(/.*\\[Vv][Bb][Ee]7\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /.*\\[Vv][Bb][Ee][Uu][Ii]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/ OR /.*\\[Vv][Bb][Ee]7[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ll]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:(*\\winword.exe OR *\\powerpnt.exe OR *\\excel.exe OR *\\outlook.exe) AND file.path:(*\\VBE7.DLL OR *\\VBEUI.DLL OR *\\VBE7INTL.DLL))`
